text: Donut collects data to enable it to operate the Services effectively, and to provide you with the best experiences on our website and our Services.
If you access other websites using the links provided, the operators of these websites may collect information from you that will be used by them in accordance with their privacy policies.

We also share your data with vendors working on our behalf; when required by law or to respond to legal process; to protect our customers; to protect lives; to maintain the security of our Services; and to protect our rights or our property.

For example, you might give us the following types of data during your use of the Services:name and email address.
If you apply for a job with us, we use your data for recruitment purposes.

We also use data for general business purposes, including, among other things, to improve customer service, to help us improve the content and functionality of our Services, to better understand our users, to protect against wrongdoing, to enforce our Terms of Service, and to generally manage our business.
We may also use the data to communicate with you to, among other things, inform you about your account, provide security updates, and give you information about the Services.
We may also use the data to manage your email subscriptions, improve the relevance and security of our website, respond to user enquiries, send you periodic marketing communications about our Services, and improve the relevance of our advertising.
We may use your data to administer contests, promotions, surveys, or other site features.
We may use your data to improve our advertising campaigns, primarily in an effort to prevent targeting of impressions via third-party channels when they are not relevant to you.
We may use your data to send you periodic emails.
We use data to carry out your transactions with us and to provide the Services to you.
We use data to continually improve our website and our Services, including system administration, system security, and adding new features or capabilities.
We use data to develop aggregate analyses and business intelligence that enable us to operate, protect, make informed decisions, and report on the performance of our business.
We use data to diagnose product problems, and to provide other customer care and support services.
We use data to provide and improve the Services we offer, and to perform essential business operations.
We use data to respond to your enquiries and requests relating to our Services, to create and administer your accounts, and to provide us with information and access to resources that you have requested from us.
Please note that we retain billing and usage metadata about a company or individual as required for compliance with law and regulation.

data_type: information about security vulnerability exploit through penetration testing
text: We engage an independent, third-party agency to perform penetration testing on a regular basis.  Information about security vulnerabilities that are successfully exploited through penetration testing is then used to set mitigation and remediation priorities.

Privacy Policy

We share your personal data with your consent, or as necessary to provide the Services to you.
Privacy Policy

Where we Store and Process Personal Data; International Transfers
This Privacy Policy (this "Policy") sets out how we collect and process personal information about you when you visit our website at donut.com, when you use our products and services (whether via our third party integrations with various collaboration services (including, among others, Slack), app.donut.ai, or otherwise) (collectively, our "Services"), or when you otherwise do business or make contact with us.
We also share personal data with vendors or agents working on our behalf for the purposes described in this Policy.
We may disclose your personal data as part of a corporate transaction such as a corporate sale, merger, reorganization, dissolution, or similar event.
We may retain your personal information as long as you continue to use the Services, have an account with us, have Donut installed on your collaboration service or other Third Party Account, or for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in the policy.
We may, however, retain personal information for an additional period as is permitted or required under applicable laws, for legal, tax, or regulatory reasons, or for legitimate and lawful business purposes.
We transfer personal data from the European Economic Area, the UK and Switzerland to other countries, some of which have not been determined by the European Commission to have an adequate level of data protection.
We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide the Services to you, or for other essential purposes such as complying with our legal obligations, resolving disputes, and enforcing our agreements.
